basics.name: Hank Chiu
basics.label: Software Engineer, front-end expert with back-end experiences
basics.summary:
### Have a deep understanding of native JavaScript plus mainstream framework experiences, including Angular, React.js, and Express.js.
Experienced in various parts of IT domain, including hardware engineering, software development, system administration. Keep following present-day web/mobile/network/open source technologies and be passionate about it!
*Remote working jobs are highly welcome.*

work.summary:
### Refactor large Angular project in terms of performance and code quality.
aetherAI provides a digital pathology system for doctors easy to work on medical images through web browsers.

Use TypeScript.

*Achievements*
- Identify the key performance bottleneck of the Angular project.
- Progressively refactor the messy state management(NGXS) without blocking the new feature developing. 
- Make the first version of PathGateway, which is a file management app made by Electron.

### Develop mobile apps using JavaScript.
KaiOS is a mobile operating system built upon browser engine.

*Achievements*
- Migrate legacy System app to modern toolchain(webpack, ES6, etc).
- Utilize the Gecko engine to build the customized b2g simulator as KaiOS SDK.
- Refactor Contact app with React to improve performance.
- Implement google account management and contacts sync.
- Cooperate with backend team to implement Payment app with PSMS payment flow.

### First dedicated web engineer in charge of architecture and implementation details.
*Achievements*
- Built the MEAN stack service for the production business.
  - MongoDB, Express.js, Angular.js, Node.js
- Design and build RESTful API for web, android, iOS applications
  - Create API reference documents
  - Use mocha for API testing
- Design/develop database schema(mongodb)
- Built platform service on AWS EC2
  - Dockerize production, testing and development environment
- Built logging system with fluentd

work.company: National Taiwan University, Clinical Psychology Lab, Mixed Signal IC design Lab
work.summary:
(parttime in college)
- Linux environment, server-side administration.
- Install/maintain science application software(MATLAB, Cadence IC, Calibre, etc)
- Customize shell scripts for automation(Python, bash shell, etc).
